titleStmt.title: The wonderfull and miraculous escape of our gracious King, from that dismal, black and gloomie defeat at Worster: together with a pattern to all true and faithfull subjects, by the five loyall and faithfull brothers, with their care and diligence, observance and obedience 8 dayes in the time of his Majesties obscurity. The tune is, come lets drink the time invites

The wonderfull and miraculous escape of our gracious King, from that dismal, black and gloomie defeat at Worster: together with a pattern to all true and faithfull subjects, by the five loyall and faithfull brothers, with their care and diligence, observance and obedience 8 dayes in the time of his Majesties obscurity. The tune is, come lets drink the time invites

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles. T Vere, and W. Gilbertson,

notesStmt.note: Verse - Come you learned poets let's cal .. .
Place of publication from Wing; date of publication found in M.S. in imprint.
Copy has date of publication in M.S. in imprint.
Reproduction of the original at the Bodleian Library.
